channel.title: [PI] How would I make it so when you kill a certain amount of monsters you get
channel.description: How do i make it so say when someone kills an certain amount of Bunnys, or w.e they automatically get given an item then when they reach 75, they get another item? Would there be a way to do this?

item.title: [PI] How would I make it so when you kill a certain amount of monsters you get
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“elatechris, post:3, topic:388396”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=484218.msg3547767#msg3547767 date=1301281029]
Yes it is quite simple…maybe you can learn some JAVA? or at least attempt by yourself or post an idea on how you would attempt it.
[/quote]

man wht is it with you people you think your so perfect? get over your selves
stop making fun of people who dont know coding very well if your going to be an ass dont post[/quote]

I don’t see anywhere in his post he stated or even implyed he was perfect, take your own advice and get over yourself and stop being so snide. He’s simply stating you should learn java and practice before you come asking for help. This section is to ask for help when you’re in desperate need of help, not for it to be abused and came to for every little problem you come across.

First step to learning to program: http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

Read full topic

Yes it is quite simple…maybe you can learn some JAVA? or at least attempt by yourself or post an idea on how you would attempt it.

man wht is it with you people you think your so perfect? get over your selves
stop making fun of people who dont know coding very well if your going to be an ass dont post[/quote]

Yea I am so full of myself because I know basic java (and that is all I know :P)
Suggesting to him to learn java is a lot better then tossing him some code snippets he does not know what to do with them.
